00050 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #define HALF_BUF_SIZE   (32 * 5)
00052 #define BUF_SIZE        (HALF_BUF_SIZE * 2)
00053 
00054 #define SOURCE_TYPE_VOICE   0
00055 #define SOURCE_TYPE_MUSIC   1
00056 #define SOURCE_TYPE_SEL     SOURCE_TYPE_VOICE
00057 
00058 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 void NVIC_Configuration(void);
00060 void CKCU_Configuration(void);
00061 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00062 void I2S_Configuration(void);
00063 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00064 
00065 void I2S_MainRoutine(void);
00066 
00067 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 vu32 TxBuf[2][HALF_BUF_SIZE];
00069 u32 RxBuf[2][HALF_BUF_SIZE];
00070 
00071 I2CM_TransferType I2CM_Transfer;
00072 volatile u8 AltBuf = 0;
00073 volatile bool IsRxTrigLevelReach = FALSE;
00074 
00075 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00077   * @brief  Main program.
00078   * @retval None
00079   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00080 int main(void)
00081 {
00082   NVIC_Configuration();
00083   CKCU_Configuration();
00084   GPIO_Configuration();
00085   RETARGET_Configuration();
00086 
00087   printf("\r\n\r\nHT32 I2S and WM8978 Loopback ...\r\n");
00088 
00089   I2CM_Init();
00090 
00091   WM8978_Init();
00092 
00093   I2S_Configuration();
00094 
00095   PDMA_Configuration();
00096 
00097   while (1)
00098   {
00099     I2S_MainRoutine();
00100   }
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00104   * @brief  I2S Main Routine.
00105   * @retval None
00106   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00107 void I2S_MainRoutine(void)
00108 {
00109   u32 i;
00110 
00111   if (IsRxTrigLevelReach == TRUE)
00112   {
00113     IsRxTrigLevelReach = FALSE;
00114     for (i = 0; i < HALF_BUF_SIZE; i++)
00115     {
00116       u32 tmp = RxBuf[AltBuf][i];
00117       TxBuf[AltBuf][i] = (tmp & 0xFFFF0000) | (tmp >> 16);
00118     }
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00123   * @brief  Delay_XuS.
00124   * @param  uS: Delay us
00125   * @retval None
00126   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00127 void Delay_XuS(u32 uS)
00128 {
00129   uS *= 20;
00130   while (uS--);
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00134   * @brief  WM8978 register read
00135   * @retval None
00136   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00137 void WM8978_RegWrite(u16 Address, u16 Data)
00138 {
00139   Address = (Address | Data) >> 8;
00140   I2CM_BlockedBufferWrite(WM8978_ID, Address, (u8*)&Data, 1);
00141 }
00142 
00143 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00144   * @brief  Init WM8978.
00145   * @retval None
00146   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00147 void WM8978_Init(void)
00148 {
00149   /********************************************
00150    * Power On Sequence
00151    ********************************************/
00152   /* REG_00                                                                                                 */
00153   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_SOFTWARE_RESET, 0);
00154   /* REG_34 (Headphone)                                                                                     */
00155   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LOUT1_VOL, LOUT1MUTE);
00156   /* REG_35 (Headphone)                                                                                     */
00157   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ROUT1_VOL, ROUT1MUTE);
00158   /* REG_36 (SPK)                                                                                           */
00159   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LOUT2_VOL, LOUT2MUTE);
00160   /* REG_37 (SPK)                                                                                           */
00161   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ROUT2_VOL, ROUT2MUTE);
00162   /* REG_38                                                                                                 */
00163   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUT3_MIXER, OUT3MUTE);
00164   /* REG_39                                                                                                 */
00165   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUT4_MIXER, OUT4MUTE);
00166   /* REG_01                                                                                                 */
00167   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT1, BUFDCOPEN | BUFIOEN | VMIDSEL_75K | BIASEN | MICBEN);
00168   /* REG_31                                                                                                 */
00169   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUTPUT, SPKBOOST);
00170   /* REG_03                                                                                                 */
00171   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT3, LMIXEN | DACENL | RMIXEN | DACENR | LOUT2EN | ROUT2EN);
00172   /* REG_02                                                                                                 */
00173   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT2, LOUT1EN | ROUT1EN | INPPGAENL | INPPGAENR | ADCENL | ADCENR);
00174 
00175   /********************************************
00176    * Digital Audio Interfaces
00177    ********************************************/
00178   /* REG_04                                                                                                 */
00179   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_AUDIO_INTERFACE, /*FMT_I2S FMT_RIGHT_JUSTIFIED*/ FMT_I2S | WL_16BITS);
00180   /* REG_06                                                                                                 */
00181   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_CLOCK_GEN, CLKSEL_MCLK | MCLK_DIV1);
00182 
00183   /********************************************
00184    * Analogue Sample Rates & Analogue Outputs
00185    ********************************************/
00186   /* REG_07                                                                                                 */
00187 #if (SOURCE_TYPE_SEL == SOURCE_TYPE_VOICE)
00188   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ADDITIONAL, SR_8KHZ);
00189 #else
00190   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ADDITIONAL, SR_48KHZ);
00191 #endif
00192   /********************************************
00193    * GPIO
00194    ********************************************/
00195   /* REG_08                                                                                                 */
00196   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_GPIO, 0);
00197 
00198   /********************************************
00199    * Output Switching
00200    ********************************************/
00201   /* REG_09                                                                                                 */
00202   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_JACK_DETECT1, 0);
00203 
00204   /********************************************
00205    * Output Signal Path & Power Management
00206    ********************************************/
00207   /* REG_0A                                                                                                 */
00208   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_DAC, 0);
00209 
00210   /********************************************
00211    * Analogue to Digital Converter
00212    ********************************************/
00213   /* REG_0B                                                                                                 */
00214   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LEFT_DAC_VOL, DACVU | 0xFF);  /* 0xFF = 0dB, 0xFE = -0.5dB, 0xFD = -1dB, ...          */
00215 
00216   /********************************************
00217    * Output Signal Path
00218    ********************************************/
00219   /* REG_0C                                                                                                 */
00220   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_RIGHT_DAC_VOL, DACVU | 0xFF); /* 0xFF = 0dB, 0xFE = -0.5dB, 0xFD = -1dB, ...          */
00221 
00222   /********************************************
00223    * Output Switching
00224    ********************************************/
00225   /* REG_0D                                                                                                 */
00226   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_JACK_DETECT2, 0);
00227 
00228   /********************************************
00229    * Analogue to Digital Converter
00230    ********************************************/
00231   /* REG_0E                                                                                                 */
00232   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ADC, HPFEN | HPFAPP | HPFCUT_0 | ADCOSR128);
00233   /* REG_0F                                                                                                 */
00234   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LEFT_ADC_VOL, ADCVU | 0xFF);  /* 0xFF = 0dB, 0xFE = -0.5dB, 0xFD = -1dB, ...          */
00235   /* REG_10                                                                                                 */
00236   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_RIGHT_ADC_VOL, ADCVU | 0xFF); /* 0xFF = 0dB, 0xFE = -0.5dB, 0xFD = -1dB, ...          */
00237 
00238   /********************************************
00239    * Output Signal Path
00240    ********************************************/
00241   /* REG_12                                                                                                 */
00242   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_EQ1, EQ3DMODE_DAC | EQ1C_80HZ | 0x0C);
00243   /* REG_13                                                                                                 */
00244   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_EQ2, EQ2BW_NARROW | EQ2C_230HZ | 0x0C);
00245   /* REG_14                                                                                                 */
00246   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_EQ3, EQ3BW_NARROW | EQ3C_650HZ | 0x0C);
00247   /* REG_15                                                                                                 */
00248   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_EQ4, EQ4BW_NARROW | EQ4C_1_8KHZ | 0x0C);
00249   /* REG_16                                                                                                 */
00250   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_EQ5, EQ5C_5_3KHZ | 0x0C);
00251   /* REG_18                                                                                                 */
00252   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_DAC_LIMITER1, LIMDCY_750US | LIMATK_94US);
00253   /* REG_19                                                                                                 */
00254   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_DAC_LIMITER2, LIMLVL_N1DB | LIMBOOST_0DB);
00255 
00256   /********************************************
00257    * Analogue to Digital Converter
00258    ********************************************/
00259   /* REG_1B                                                                                                 */
00260   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_NOTCH_FILTER1, 0);
00261   /* REG_1C                                                                                                 */
00262   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_NOTCH_FILTER2, 0);
00263   /* REG_1D                                                                                                 */
00264   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_NOTCH_FILTER3, 0);
00265   /* REG_1E                                                                                                 */
00266   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_NOTCH_FILTER4, 0);
00267 
00268   /********************************************
00269    * Input Limiter Automatic Level Control
00270    ********************************************/
00271   /* REG_20                                                                                                 */
00272   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ALC1, ALCSEL_BOTH_ON | ALCMAXGAIN_35_25DB | ALCMINGAIN_N12DB);
00273   /* REG_21                                                                                                 */
00274   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ALC2, ALCHLD_0MS | ALCLVL_N12DBFS);
00275   /* REG_22                                                                                                 */
00276 #if (SOURCE_TYPE_SEL == SOURCE_TYPE_VOICE)
00277   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ALC3, ALCMODE_ALC | ALCDCY_3 | ALCATK_2);   // 8 kHz
00278 #else
00279   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ALC3, ALCMODE_ALC | ALCDCY_10 | ALCATK_6);  // 44.1 kHz
00280 #endif
00281   /* REG_23                                                                                                 */
00282   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_NOISE_GATE, NGEN | NGTH_N75DB);
00283 
00284   /********************************************
00285    * Analogue Outputs
00286    ********************************************/
00287   /* REG_2B                                                                                                 */
00288   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_BEEP, INVROUT2);
00289 
00290   /********************************************
00291    * Input Signal Path
00292    ********************************************/
00293   /* REG_2C                                                                                                 */
00294   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_INPUT, MBVSEL_0_65AVDD | RIN2INPVGA | RIP2INPVGA | LIN2INPVGA | LIP2INPVGA);
00295   /* REG_2D                                                                                                 */
00296   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LEFT_PGA_GAIN, INPPGAUPDATE | 0x10);
00297   /* REG_2E                                                                                                 */
00298   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_RIGHT_PGA_GAIN, INPPGAUPDATE | 0x10);
00299   /* REG_2F                                                                                                 */
00300   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LEFT_ADC_BOOST, /* PGABOOSTL | */ L2_2BOOSTVOL_DISABLED | AUXL2BOOSTVOL_DISABLED);
00301   /* REG_30                                                                                                 */
00302   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_RIGHT_ADC_BOOST, /* PGABOOSTR | */ R2_2BOOSTVOL_DISABLED | AUXR2BOOSTVOL_DISABLED);
00303 
00304   /********************************************
00305    * Analogue Output
00306    ********************************************/
00307   /* REG_31                                                                                                 */
00308   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUTPUT, TSDEN | SPKBOOST);
00309   /* REG_32                                                                                                 */
00310   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LEFT_MIXER, /* BYPLMIXVOL_6DB | BYPL2LMIX */ DACL2LMIX);
00311   /* REG_33                                                                                                 */
00312   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_RIGHT_MIXER, /* BYPRMIXVOL_6DB | BYPR2RMIX */ DACR2RMIX);
00313   /* REG_34                                                                                                 */
00314   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LOUT1_VOL, HPVU | (0x39 + 0));    // +0 dB range from -57dB to +6dB
00315   /* REG_35                                                                                                 */
00316   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ROUT1_VOL, HPVU | (0x39 + 0));    // +0 dB range from -57dB to +6dB
00317   /* REG_36                                                                                                 */
00318   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_LOUT2_VOL, SPKVU | (0x39 + 0));    // +0 dB range from -57dB to +6dB
00319   /* REG_37                                                                                                 */
00320   WM8978_RegWrite(REG_ROUT2_VOL, SPKVU | (0x39 + 0));    // +0 dB range from -57dB to +6dB
00321   /* REG_38                                                                                                 */
00322   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUT3_MIXER, OUT3MUTE);
00323   /* REG_39                                                                                                 */
00324   //WM8978_RegWrite(REG_OUT4_MIXER, OUT4MUTE);
00325 }

00327 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00328   * @brief  Configure I2S.
00329   * @retval None
00330   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00331 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00332 {
00333   /* I2S                                                                                                    */
00334   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2S);
00335   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2S_SDO_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_I2S_SDO_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_I2S);
00336   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2S_SDI_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_I2S_SDI_AFIO_PIN,  AFIO_FUN_I2S);
00337   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2S);
00338   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2S_WS_GPIO_ID,   HTCFG_I2S_WS_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_I2S);
00339 
00340   /* I2C                                                                                                    */
00341   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00342   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00343 }

00345 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00346   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00347   * @retval None
00348   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00349 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00350 {
00351   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00352   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA          = 1;
00353   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_I2C_IPN = 1;
00354   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO          = 1;
00355   CKCUClock.Bit.I2S           = 1;
00356   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00357 }
00358 
00359 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00360   * @brief  Configure NVIC vector table.
00361   * @retval None
00362   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00363 void NVIC_Configuration(void)
00364 {
00365   NVIC_SetVectorTable(NVIC_VECTTABLE_FLASH, 0x0);     /* Set the Vector Table base location at 0x00000000   */
00366 
00367   NVIC_EnableIRQ(I2S_IRQn);
00368   NVIC_EnableIRQ(PDMACH0_1_IRQn);
00369   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_I2C_IRQn);
00370 }

00372 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00373  * @brief   This function is used to init the I2C master.
00374  * @retval  None
00375  ************************************************************************************************************/
00376 void I2CM_Init(void)
00377 {
00378   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00379      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00380      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00381   */
00382   I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00383 
00384   /* I2C configuration                                                                                      */
00385   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall     = I2C_GENERALCALL_DISABLE;
00386   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode  = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00387   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge     = I2C_ACK_DISABLE;
00388   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress      = I2CM_OWN_ADDR;
00389   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed           = I2CM_SPEED;
00390   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset     = 0;
00391   I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00392 
00393   I2C_SetTimeOutPrescaler(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, I2C_PRESCALER_128);
00394   I2C_SetTimeOutValue(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, ((SystemCoreClock/128) * 8 * 10) / I2CM_SPEED); /* Must within 10 Bytes Time    */
00395 
00396   /* Enable I2C                                                                                             */
00397   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, ENABLE);
00398   I2C_TimeOutCmd(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, ENABLE);
00399 
00400   /* Enable I2C interrupts                                                                                  */
00401   I2C_IntConfig(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, I2C_INT_STA | I2C_INT_ADRS | I2C_INT_RXDNE | I2C_INT_TXDE |\
00402                       I2C_INT_RXNACK | I2C_INT_TOUT | I2C_INT_BUSERR | I2C_INT_ARBLOS, ENABLE);
00403 }
00404 
00405 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00406  * @brief   Set the word address mode used 8 bits or 16 bits.
00407  * @param   word_addr_mode: Specify addressing mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
00408  *    @arg   I2CM_WORD_ADDR_MODE_1BYTE
00409  *    @arg   I2CM_WORD_ADDR_MODE_2BYTE
00410  * @retval  none
00411  ************************************************************************************************************/
00412 void I2CM_WordAddressModeConfig(u32 word_addr_mode)
00413 {
00414   I2CM_Transfer.RegAddrMode = word_addr_mode;
00415 }
00416 
00417 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00418  * @brief   Install the I2C master transfer end callback function.
00419  * @param   callback: Specify a pointer that point to callback function.
00420  * @retval  none
00421  ************************************************************************************************************/
00422 void I2CM_InstallTransferEndCallback(void (*callback)(void))
00423 {
00424   I2CM_Transfer.TransferEndCallback = callback;
00425 }
00426 
00427 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00428  * @brief   Uninstall the I2C master transfer end callback function
00429  * @retval  none
00430  ************************************************************************************************************/
00431 void I2CM_UninstallTransferEndCallback(void)
00432 {
00433   I2CM_Transfer.TransferEndCallback = NULL;
00434 }
00435 
00436 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00437  * @brief   Get the I2C master transfer status.
00438  * @retval  SUCCESS or ERROR
00439  ************************************************************************************************************/
00440 u32 I2CM_GetTransferStatus(void)
00441 {
00442   u32 return_value = I2CM_BUSY;
00443   I2CM_TransferType* pTransfer = &I2CM_Transfer;
00444 
00445   if (pTransfer->Status != I2CM_BUSY)
00446   {
00447     u32 timeout = 500; /* 50 mS                                                                             */
00448     while (I2C_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY))
00449     {
00450       I2CM_DelayXuS(100);
00451       timeout--;
00452       if (timeout == 0)
00453       {
00454         pTransfer->Status = I2CM_TOUTF;
00455         I2C_GenerateSTOP(HTCFG_I2C_PORT);
00456         I2CM_DelayXuS(1000);
00457         I2C_DeInit(HTCFG_I2C_PORT);
00458         break;
00459       }
00460     }
00461     return_value = pTransfer->Status;
00462   }
00463 
00464   return return_value;
00465 }
00466 
00467 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00468  * @brief   Waits until the transfer is completed.
00469  * @retval  SUCCESS or ERROR
00470  ************************************************************************************************************/
00471 ErrStatus I2CM_WaitTransferEnd(void)
00472 {
00473   ErrStatus retv = ERROR;
00474 
00475   while (1)
00476   {
00477     u32 status = I2CM_GetTransferStatus();
00478     if (status != I2CM_BUSY)
00479     {
00480       if (status == I2CM_OK)
00481       {
00482         retv = SUCCESS;
00483       }
00484       else
00485       {
00486         I2CM_DBG_PRINTF("\r\nI2CM Error state 0x%X at line %u\r\n", status, __LINE__);
00487       }
00488       break;
00489     }
00490   }
00491 
00492   return retv;
00493 }
00494 
00495 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00496  * @brief   Read data from I2C.
00497  * @param   dev: Specify the target I2C device address.
00498  * @param   word_addr: Specify the word address of target I2C device.
00499  * @param   data: Specify pointer that point to the receive buffer.
00500  * @param   count: Specify the read data length.
00501  * @retval  None
00502  ************************************************************************************************************/
00503 void I2CM_BufferRead(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00504 {
00505   I2CM_TransferType* pTransfer = &I2CM_Transfer;
00506 
00507   while (I2CM_GetTransferStatus() == I2CM_BUSY);
00508 
00509   pTransfer->RegAddr     = word_addr;
00510   pTransfer->Buffer      = data;
00511   pTransfer->Length      = count;
00512   pTransfer->Counter     = 0;
00513   pTransfer->Direction   = I2CM_DIRECTION_IN;
00514   pTransfer->DevAddr     = dev;
00515   pTransfer->Status      = I2CM_BUSY;
00516   pTransfer->RetryDownCounter = I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY;
00517 
00518   /* Send I2C START                                                                                         */
00519   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, pTransfer->DevAddr, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00520 }
00521 
00522 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00523  * @brief   Blocked Read data from I2C.
00524  * @param   dev: Specify the target I2C device address.
00525  * @param   word_addr: Specify the word address of target I2C device.
00526  * @param   data: Specify pointer that point to the receiver buffer.
00527  * @param   count: Specify the read data length.
00528  * @retval  SUCCESS or ERROR
00529  ************************************************************************************************************/
00530 ErrStatus I2CM_BlockedBufferRead(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00531 {
00532   I2CM_BufferRead(dev, word_addr, data, count);
00533   return I2CM_WaitTransferEnd();
00534 }
00535 
00536 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00537  * @brief   Write data to I2C.
00538  * @param   dev: Specify the target I2C device address.
00539  * @param   word_addr: Specify the word address of target I2C device.
00540  * @param   data: Specify pointer that point to the transmitter buffer.
00541  * @param   count: Specify the write data length.
00542  * @retval  None
00543  ************************************************************************************************************/
00544 void I2CM_BufferWrite(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00545 {
00546   I2CM_TransferType* pTransfer = &I2CM_Transfer;
00547 
00548   while (I2CM_GetTransferStatus() == I2CM_BUSY);
00549 
00550   pTransfer->RegAddr     = word_addr;
00551   pTransfer->Buffer      = data;
00552   pTransfer->Length      = count;
00553   pTransfer->Counter     = 0;
00554   pTransfer->Direction   = I2CM_DIRECTION_OUT;
00555   pTransfer->DevAddr     = dev;
00556   pTransfer->Status      = I2CM_BUSY;
00557   pTransfer->RetryDownCounter = I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY;
00558 
00559   /* Send I2C START                                                                                         */
00560   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_PORT, pTransfer->DevAddr, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00561 
00562 }
00563 
00564 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00565  * @brief   Blocked write data to I2C.
00566  * @param   dev: Specify the target I2C device address.
00567  * @param   word_addr: Specify the word address of target I2C device.
00568  * @param   data: Specify pointer that point to the transmitter buffer.
00569  * @param   count: Specify the write data length.
00570  * @retval  SUCCESS or ERROR
00571  ************************************************************************************************************/
00572 ErrStatus I2CM_BlockedBufferWrite(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00573 {
00574   I2CM_BufferWrite(dev, word_addr, data, count);
00575   return I2CM_WaitTransferEnd();
00576 }
00577 
00578 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00579   * @brief  Configure the I2S.
00580   * @retval None
00581   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00582 void I2S_Configuration(void)
00583 {
00584   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00585      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00586      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00587   */
00588   I2S_InitTypeDef I2S_InitStructure;
00589   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_Mode = I2S_MASTER_TX_RX;
00590   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_Format = I2S_JUSTIFIED_STEREO;
00591   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_WordWidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00592   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_MclkOut = ENABLE;
00593   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_MclkInv = DISABLE;
00594   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_BclkInv = DISABLE;
00595 #if (SOURCE_TYPE_SEL == SOURCE_TYPE_VOICE)
00596   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_X_Div = HTCFG_I2S_VOICE_X_DIV;            // MCLK = (PCLK * X_DIV / Y_DIV) / 2 = about 2.048 MHz (256 x 8 kHz, WM8978 required the MCLK = 256 fs)
00597   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_Y_Div = HTCFG_I2S_VOICE_Y_DIV;
00598   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_N_Div = 256 / (2 * 16) - 1;               // BCLK = MCLK / 8 = about 256 kHz (32 x 8 kHz, 2 CH x 16-bit = 32 fs)
00599 #else
00600   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_X_Div = HTCFG_I2S_MUSIC_X_DIV;            // MCLK = (PCLK * X_DIV / Y_DIV) / 2 = about 12.288 MHz (256 x 48 kHz, WM8978 required the MCLK = 256 fs)
00601   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_Y_Div = HTCFG_I2S_MUSIC_Y_DIV;
00602   I2S_InitStructure.I2S_N_Div = 256 / (2 * 16) - 1;               // BCLK = MCLK / 8 = about 1536 kHz (32 x 48 kHz, 2 CH x 16-bit = 32 fs)
00603 #endif
00604   I2S_Init(&I2S_InitStructure);
00605 }
00606 
00607 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00608   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00609   * @retval None
00610   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00611 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00612 {
00613   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00614      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00615      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00616   */
00617   PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00618 
00619   /* I2S TX                                                                                                 */
00620   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)&TxBuf[0][0];
00621   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&HT_I2S->TXDR;
00622   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = (SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX | AUTO_RELOAD);
00623   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = BUF_SIZE/5;
00624   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 5;
00625   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_32BIT;
00626   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = M_PRIO;
00627   PDMA_Config(PDMA_CH2, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00628   PDMA_EnaCmd(PDMA_CH2, ENABLE);
00629 
00630   I2S_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(I2S_TX_FIFO, 3);  // Tx FIFO data '<' or '=' 3
00631   I2S_IntConfig(I2S_INT_TXFIFO_UDF, ENABLE);
00632   I2S_PDMACmd(I2S_PDMAREQ_TX, ENABLE);
00633 
00634 
00635   /* I2S RX                                                                                                 */
00636   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)&HT_I2S->RXDR;
00637   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&RxBuf[0][0];
00638   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = (SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_LIN_INC | AUTO_RELOAD);
00639   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = BUF_SIZE/5;
00640   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 5;
00641   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_32BIT;
00642   PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = H_PRIO;
00643   PDMA_Config(PDMA_CH1, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00644   PDMA_IntConfig(PDMA_CH1, (PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC | PDMA_INT_HT), ENABLE);
00645   PDMA_EnaCmd(PDMA_CH1, ENABLE);
00646 
00647   I2S_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(I2S_RX_FIFO, 5);  // Rx FIFO data '>' or '=' 5
00648   I2S_PDMACmd(I2S_PDMAREQ_RX, ENABLE);
00649   I2S_IntConfig(I2S_INT_RXFIFO_OVF, ENABLE);
00650 
00651   I2S_Cmd(ENABLE);
00652 }

00660   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00661 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00665      Debug message can be added here.
00666      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00667   */
00668 
00669   while (1)
00670   {
00671   }
00672 }
00673 #endif
